hero.title: Master React Native Development
hero.des1: 330+ interactive examples | 11 UI libraries | 57 custom animations
hero.des2: All in one app. Learn by doing.

benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.des1: It does a lot of things

card1.title: Rich UI component library
card1.des1:
Integrate 7 major UI component libraries, including 50 custom components, providing a complete solution from basic to advanced. 
Whether it's a simple button or a complex 3D animation, it can be easily implemented.

card2.title: Cross-platform consistency
card2.des1: Built on Expo and React Native, one set of code supports iOS, Android and Web platforms simultaneously, ensuring an excellent user experience on all devices.

card3.title: High performance animation effects
card3.des1: It uses Reanimated, Skia and Three.js technology stacks to provide smooth 2D/3D animation effects, giving your application performance comparable to native performance.

card4.title: Modern development experience
card4.des1: TypeScript type safety, Expo Router file routing, Redux state management, complete international support and theme system provide developers with the best development experience.

title.title3: From free exploration to complete source code access
title.title21: Choose the Perfect Plan for You

content.des15: Choose any 1 custom component full source code
content.des53: Just starting to learn React Native
content.des56: Want to learn best practices in depth
content.des58: â†’ Choose Free Version, familiarize with the ecosystem first
content.des59: â†’ Choose Single Component, best value for money
content.des60: â†’ Choose Full Source Code, one-time investment for long-term benefits
content.des61: â†’ Choose Full Source Code, complete architecture reference
content.des62: â†’ Choose Full Source Code, save team time costs
content.des63: Q: What does a single component include?
content.des64: A: Includes complete implementation code of the component, related resource files, usage documentation, and dependency instructions. Can be directly copied to your project for use.
content.des65: Q: Does the full source code version include all components?
content.des66: A: Yes, includes complete source code of all 200+ components displayed in the app, plus the entire project configuration and architecture.
content.des67: Q: Can I get technical support?
content.des68: A: Full source code version users can receive priority technical support via email, with a response time of 24-48 hours.
content.des70: A: Full source code version and single components are digital products, no refunds are supported after download.
content.des71: Q: What's the scope of commercial licensing?
content.des72: A: Can be used in any commercial projects, modified and integrated, but cannot resell the source code itself.

title.title2: Have questions about our React Native components? Need technical support? We're here to help you succeed with your mobile development journey.
title.title4: Your message will be sent via Telegram for faster response

content.des4: Please provide detailed information about your inquiry...
content.des28: We typically respond to all inquiries within 24 hours. For urgent matters, you can reach us via Telegram for faster response times.
content.des29: Yes! Full source code version users receive priority technical support via email with 24-48 hour response times.
content.des30: Absolutely! We love hearing about new ideas. Please contact us with your requirements and we'll discuss how we can help.
content.des31: The complete source code version and individual components are digital products, and refunds are not supported after downloading.
content.des32: You can report bugs via GitHub issues, email, or Telegram. Please include as much detail as possible about the issue.
content.des33: Join thousands of developers who are already using our components to build amazing React Native apps.
